mapper.select: SELECT c._id, c.username, c.time, p.profiledata, c.content, (SELECT count(_id) from comment_tb where content_id = #{content_id} and menu_id = #{menu_id})commentcount FROM comment_tb as c JOIN profile_tb as p on c.username = p.username WHERE content_id = #{content_id} AND menu_id = #{menu_id} Order BY _id DESC LIMIT #{displaypost},#{postnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_tb( content_id, username, content, time, menu_id) VALUES (#{content_id}, #{username}, #{content}, NOW(), #{menu_id})
